name: Amoxicillin
usage: Take 1 tablet three times a day with food

name: Ibuprofen
usage: Take 1 tablet every 4-6 hours as needed for pain

name: Lisinopril
usage: Take 1 tablet daily in the morning

name: Metformin
usage: Take 1 tablet twice a day with meals

name: Atorvastatin
usage: Take 1 tablet daily in the evening
